name: Ninad Patel
text: Really delicious pizzas, Staff and drivers are really polite and hard working. Management is second to none. Always like to go there because staff is always smiling and happy. Try Creamy Garlic Sauce, my fav. I would like to thank each and everyone working there. keep feeding us good pizzas.

name: WE Inc
text: Unacceptable and unprofessional for a international business! First bad experience and they are downtown in Philadelphia. They don't answer the phone and takes 2hrs to deliver 3 items that we boxed over 30 minutes ago.  Never again.
